abstract: Mohammed Rehman and his former wife Sana Ahmed Khan are sentenced by British judge to life in prison after being found guilty of plotting terrorist attack in London on 10th anniversary of transit bombings.
lead_paragraph: The sentences were for a divorced couple convicted of plotting a terrorist attack in London on the 10th anniversary of the transit bombings there.
snippet: The sentences were for a divorced couple convicted of plotting a terrorist attack in London on the 10th anniversary of the transit bombings there.
